description: The module provides essential concepts and techniques related to the evaluation of occupational exposure to gases, vapors, and aerosols. Topics covered include air flow measurements, aerosol science, particulate sampling with and without size separation, optical microscopy, active and passive sampling of gases and vapors, direct reading instruments, sampling strategy and statistical evaluation of exposure data, Singapore legislative and international guidelines on occupational exposure limits and threshold limit values.
title: Chemical Hazard Evaluation
